General.Name: Baotou Huazi Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Baotou Huazi Industry Co., Ltd engages in refining, producing, warehousing, and selling sugar in China. The company offers sugar products under the Grassland brand. In addition, it is involved in livestock farming; and agricultural and sideline food processing activities. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Baotou, China.
